text: Hello Devs! So i am running a custom setup with gulp to compile my scss files to css. It works and so but sometimes if i have many modules and compile the SCSS it does not upload all of the module css compiled files, just some of them. So often i end up with modules missing styling because the css didnt upload? Any idea how to fix this or if there is a workaround?
Hey <@U0490TM486L> This channel is really best suited for HubSpot operations workflows, I think you might be better luck posting in <#CFPRTEGTX|modules>
this is usually a webpack issue and you may need to add into webpack or whatever is compiling it a outside scss compiling package
You can also just save your css elsewhere and then reference it from the module.
bonus with this technique is you can load your styling asynchronously

Has anyone figured out how to get around HubSpot auto formatting fields for workflows _without_ having to copy the property to another one? i.e. this problem in the screenshot doesn't actually work because of the formatting.
